extendedInfo.description: Get the ultimate chess app! Join over 7 million players with unlimited free play, thousands of chess puzzles, hundreds of video lessons, and a powerful computer opponent!"I've tried every chess app out there and the Chess.com app is in a class by itself. It's the only chess app you'll ever need, and the best choice if you want to improve!" - Michael PLAY CHESS ONLINE: - Challenge your friends- Chat with your opponents - Play fast or slow with any time controlPLAY COMPUTER: - Get simple hints or deep analysisTACTICS TRAINER: - Solve more than 50,000 puzzles - Difficulty is automatically adjusted to your level- Track your progress with a rating and statsVIDEO LESSONS: - Hundreds of video lessons created by top coaches- Games are annotated with helpful arrows and highlights- Strategy, Openings, Endgames, Tactics & moreABOUT CHESS.COM: Chess.com is the #1 online chess site with more than 7 million members. Chess.com is built by chess players and enthusiasts who really love chess, not just programmers tinkering around with chess. We are committed to promoting chess and improving access to chess in every possible way. Visit http://www.chess.com/about to meet us!

reviews.title: Difficulty never changes!
reviews.comment: I played the computer on one second thinking time and it made almost the exact same moves as it did for thiry seconds! Serious flaw. On the desktop version you choose a ranking to play against which is a lot better of a system, especially for people who want to play a casual game, not some hardcore computer stuck on max difficulty.
reviews.author: Patrick Hamill

reviews.title: I\'ve had real troubles with this app
reviews.comment: Very buggy. I make a move that registers only for it to be taken back several minutes later.
reviews.author: Peter Russell

reviews.title: Crash crash
reviews.comment: This useless application does nothing other than to keep crashing in the middle of a game. By the time the application is restarted the game is over by time.  Another disaster in Google play
reviews.author: Shreyas R

reviews.title: Update 6-10-2013
reviews.comment: Reset password in app, not sure why that was needed but app works again.
reviews.author: Paul C

reviews.title: Great app, but buggy
reviews.comment: The gaming experience itself is pretty amazing, very responsive.  However the login process is buggy both on nexus 4 and 7.  Each time I have to close the app, logout and then log back in even though it thinks I\'m already logged in.
reviews.author: Swami Venkataramani

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I like to play often & this let\'s me know when its my turn even tho I have multiple online games going on.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Would recommend it but...
reviews.comment: The net code seems broken. Persisting bugs are: bug on reconnect and login bug \"please log in again\". Since most users have WiFi off on sleep policy set by default renders app unusable for them. Unusable on weaker connections as well
reviews.author: Anton Egorov

reviews.title: Not bad, needs improvement
reviews.comment: The interface is too simple, it\'s difficult to find friends, a lot of things direct me to the website when it could be integrated into the app. Notifications still need work. Please add the option to have a slight animation when moving pieces, the instant move it does now if slightly disorienting :(
reviews.author: Bart Yong

reviews.title: Chess Mentor
reviews.comment: The app would better if it allowed the user to train in the Chess Mentor part.  I also agree with Nicholas Harvey, the Tactics Trainer on the app docks more points for incorrect (and sometimes correct but too long of time) answers and awards fewer for correct answers than compared to the web browser version.  The Play Online part is the really the useful function from the app. I don\'t see myself every playing Live Chess on the phone screen.
reviews.author: Jason Self

reviews.title: Live chess unreliable
reviews.comment: As others spotted: it often doesn\'t register your move and you loose on time although it shows opponent\'s timer ticking. Waist of time and points. Online chess good.
reviews.author: Krzysztof Jaros

reviews.title: After most recent updates...
reviews.comment: Scoring on tactics outrageous. You solve puzzles, get 1-3 points for what would be 15 on the website, but when it\'s wrong, you lose 27 !!! Absolutely ridiculous.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unusable
reviews.comment: This used to be a great app. The last update made it unusable as it crashes before even opening. Such a shame.
reviews.author: James Fisher

reviews.title: Log in problems
reviews.comment: Well they seem to not allow you to do pre-moves and after you log in and play a few games it becomes very difficult to find more later.
reviews.author: David Trail

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Chess <3
reviews.author: Adam Driver

reviews.title: Best
reviews.comment: this is the best chess app out there.. e\'thing is better in this app compared to other cheap chess apps. if u r looking for chess on android, this is the best one, without ant doubt..
reviews.author: Bijay Balla

reviews.title: Consistently crashes
reviews.comment: It\'s a good app, easy to use, but it\'s just unreliable. Constantly crashes in middle of games so you lose two minutes of chess game time. If reliability was improved then 5 stars
reviews.author: John Mellan

reviews.title: Can\'t create an account
reviews.comment: I cannot creat an account. Everytime I fill out my information and click create account, it says system error.
reviews.author: Summer Box

reviews.title: Worst app ever!
reviews.comment: Crashes all the time on live matches and on online games it crashes when im thinking about my next move! Waste of time
reviews.author: Joshua Ashmore

reviews.comment: Screen continuously rotates after each move I make.  Please fix... Otherwise have found no further issues.  Sony Xperia Android 4.1.2
reviews.author: montrail cooper

reviews.comment: Crap since updates.  Now it keeps telling me to login again over and over.  I guess i will be timing out in all my games.  Sure glad im a paying member
reviews.author: Jason Oehrlein
